Title: Everest Energy is likely spoofing its AIS; could be next to call at sanctioned Arctic LNG 2 project
Description: The 138,028 m3 Everest Energy LNG tanker cannot be located at its reported position in the Barents Sea, indicating that it is spoofing its AIS to call covertly at the sanctioned Novatek-operated 19.8 mtpa Arctic LNG 2 project on Russiaâ€™s Gydan Peninsula to load a cargo.
